local_intent: Align to the T block, set yaw to 90 deg, perform a 0.1 m push at 90 deg, and verify the block remains visible.
assumptions: Block and goal are observable; push direction 90 deg is valid for target motion; detection may require retries.
coherence_with_global: Matches global plan: detect t_block with retry, align, set yaw=90, execute short push (0.1 at 90), then verify visibility; consistent with repeated push-and-realign sequence.
